name: io.fourplayers.odin
description: Our .NET (C#) SDK is available and can be used on client and server side implementing the CLR for .NET.

samples.description: Client for custom scripting to interact with 4Players ODIN.
Simple example to join a room in addition to the OdinClient.
Simple example to join a room and use Push-to-talk (PTT) in addition to the OdinClient.
Example showcase for OdinClient Unity AudioSource with positional audio.
